resources.string: GOOOY!
GOOOY
Ask your question, then hold me to get your answer.
Whoa, too quick there buddy!
Hold your finger a bit longer, I’m getting there!
You can’t just tap me for 0.02 seconds and expect wisdom!
Hold
Release
Feels like you’re calling upon a higher light — a wise one who knows what you’re about to face.\n From now on, just say “Gooooy!” to Gooooy, the all-knowing light of wisdom and guidance.
Continue
Let’s go!
For example, when you’re not sure if that person’s “the one”… or even if you should go out for dinner tonight or not.
Dark
Light
Same as phone
Now tell me — what language should I talk to you in?
And what color vibe do you want for the app?
Didn’t like my answer
I get it, you didn’t like it — but destiny says otherwise.
Bro, I swear I’m trying not to show this again… but it’s like you’re cursed!
Okay this is getting weird — maybe just accept it already.
Huh, seeing this again? That’s suspicious…
Wow, this answer really has you hooked!
Honestly, I’ve got no idea how you keep ending up with the same answer!
